title: The Influence of Context on Dialogue Act Recognition
abstract: This article presents a deep analysis of the influence of context information on dialogue act recognition. We performed experiments on the annotated subsets of three different corpora: the widely explored Switchboard Dialog Act Corpus, as well as the unexplored LEGO and Cambridge Restaurant corpora.
